text: Playing House is closing its doors. USA Network has canceled the Jessica St. Clair - Lennon Parham comedy after three seasons, The Hollywood Reporter has learned. “ USA Network and Universal Cable Productions want to thank Jessica, Lennon and the entire cast and crew of Playing House for being amazing partners for three incredible, hilarious seasons,'' the network and studio said Monday in a joint statement. ` ` It was an honor and privilege to be part of this best friendship. Once a Jammer, always a Jammer. ” St. Clair and Parham on Monday released a video message to the show's fans addressing the show's end. ` ` We had three beautiful seasons and we wanted to thank you guys,'' Parham said.
